items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: Very soft and I bought a 2x and it was perfect size. The length was perfect also. Read more
items.author: Myra Griffith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, lightweight sweater.
items.body: I love this sweater! It's perfect for a fall day that you might want a light sweater. The knit is very very fine, it does snag easily. I snagged mine on a shopping cart but I was able to fix it. I still love it though, I have always been a fan of sweaters and this one is no exception. Definitely recommend, just don't expect it to be bulky and super warm for winter. Read more
items.author: Two cents

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style and cozy
items.body: I love it,, feels comfortable and the is nice style to wear with anything. Thank you Read more
items.author: Corey Thompson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy!
items.body: Thus is very thin! How can even sell such a poor quality product! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Good and Not So Good
items.body: Soft, comfortable fit. Medium- to light-weight yarn. I got the black-and-white version to go with lots of different articles of clothing. I expect the lightweight nature of the yarn to stretch the sweater out of shape after wearing several times. It is also designed for mild temperatures - not extreme cold. The loose knit will not shield much on a blustery day. This is much longer than I expected, coming almost to my knees. I am uncertain whether I would buy it again at this price. Read more
items.author: The Pen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: This sweater has a really nice look with its color block design and good color combinations. It’s lightweight and thin, making it a great layering piece for fall or spring without feeling too heavy. The only thing to note is that it runs small—I normally wear a plus size and ordered a 3X, but it fits more like an XL. Definitely size up when ordering. Overall, comfortable and stylish once you get the right fit! Soft fabric and good seams it's a polyester combo fabric so it's soft. Read more
items.author: kaz

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money!
items.body: Very poor quality, light weight. Definitely not worth the price. Read more
items.author: Samaree Speaks TV

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue Colorblock, Hotpink and Black, Army Green Colorblock, Mint Green Colorblock, Light Pink Colorblock, Black and White Colorblock, Multicoloured Colorblock, Hotpink Colorblock. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
